description: Runtime server features for ASP.NET Core hosted Uno Platform applications.
releaseNotes:
#  (2022-10-26)


### Bug Fixes

* Add the ability to disable the automatic inclusion of Microsoft.Windows.Compatibility (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/9e15eb076455fe5fc56229dd8eb25aa8d0e0008c)
* Adjust error message on emscripten/ninja failure (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/4fa484a6af51d3f100778d3fac77f19867bb6f1f)
* Adjust for long paths on emcc-libk step (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/ee227b2d1fb64084600e50e37c97315516f2f90d)
* Adjust for net5 targets (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/de40b8585fa2190e1df036a9ff4ed318e12b8894)
* Adjust for TZ environment variable (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/29235f85558ab053211a52d30d7bcedaa892d7f6)
* Adjust mimeType for json files (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/a434af9ed1e2a25659dffb8166fa79155ffc0c4e)
* Adjust python validation on windows (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/703e5e23979a400f5c403209ec6d9aa7f741b22f)
* Copy pdb files only if present (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/b3ad139d82600477bcc4b07d35680550709547e3)
* **debug:** cpifdiff invalid linux condition (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/4595509abb5b7150330ea4b5687d69d920ad738d)
* Disable WasmShellIncludeWindowsCompatibility for net7 and later (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/8cca11aec13f1f6da07f7b59984a0ac5e6b83acd)
* **dotnet:** Show a proper error message when .NET 6 SDK is not installed (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/a0392b58b1bd3c341152d0ad0a82d50517938625)
* Enable debugging by default when running inside VS (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/bbb4d0b955b1e1f0d8b46e7f90932aa61450c8ef)
* Ensure emscripten can run with linker disabled (interpreter only) (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/8cbc5183695120bd8b114cdc71d243d4bb7fa5f0)
* Ensure that linked out files are removed from mono-config.json (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/765e81a2da637194032291f1c1e45594c08b523b)
* Ensure that ninja failures fail the build (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/d3df4a48862024d7a67364285b0c3c43027600de)
* export more emscripten symbols (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/d9dc4ef4c4b0bf17eaac8cd406e190ca35021748)
* incorrect links in features-linker-opts (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/a40b560a38c52f25130a2a9499974e2a7ca998ac)
* incorrect relative path in features-linker-opts (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/2a14cb15a0c93079f834e1e7d313b0370e8cb1f3)
* **native:** Adjust version selection partial matching (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/63acee2ca2f65721592d95ce10a0d982b9f80cbd)
* **pgaot:** Remove workaround for https://github.com/mono/mono/issues/19824 (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/752fd93a2e1eeed60503da147093580dc9025ad8)
* Profile generation after runtime modularization (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/0c2736922d7c4cb53cad0706e9beca22b197cb21)
* Properly report python not being installed (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/920e75624a40729f9bcff9a1434f328bdd9653d1)
* Reduce build task locking during development (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/7537052ac23b62a51cb94acd2df15f3ada45533b)
* Register Uno namespace globally, adjust visibility of aotProfile recorder method (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/5a1d00a474ded5d58686f62e8c803a529135bb7b)
* Remove TaskFactory use as it fails on linux (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/c0e85fdcfbfac46c821957e1d93ca89fa8e1efe5)
* Reschedule on empty require dependencies (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/a72264906319e680f5999508770d51aa048fd9c0)
* Restore IDBFS support for net7 (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/0b6710f0ca63f72c189b888322fa215c1c4ff003)
* Restore log profiler feature (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/cce3c1db855cc01af0a5d38aba3f5cbcb90fac8c)
* Run the bootstrapper in a separate process (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/7e5a2de8cc2e45e56f3c43beb7e01eceddd9afab)
* Show idbfs status in sample app (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/eac335ede9b1b1f06b66e416c2f0de197b92d187)
* Split emcc-link and wasm-opt to avoid long command lines issue (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/8504617a7f1ad4966fcfafe09a859fadd6a93bf8)
* Use bash prefix for cp commands (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/cd946c56ca79fef6508d71d220ac7b9a4952bb76)
* Use response file for emcc link step (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/71e637506bc35084974fef572bb2ea38ab7efdd0)
* **windows:** fail on emcc failure (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/dec7a002598f69be6af9a3a0ca6f2d6514e0ff2d)


* feat!: Add support for .NET 7 (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/e4e5f433056bb270e36a97c7a46eef07bcb139c4)


### Features

* Add assemblies obfuscation and extensions adjustment (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/951fe316d06f5d2952d0bdeb01e6ff20f7702f67)
* Add support for custom EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/0e422a7111cb4d771258d498732f3d29f2a2245c)
* Add support for interp to native cookies generation (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/b025bacf7fd07b312a0156bf469e7ab104dc6c0a)
* Add support for runtime features bitcode files selection (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/f583bc25b73725293cec3649fa8644a4a478e970)
* Add support for static assets embedded in another ASP.NET app (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/c9bb187036cd03b1da5adff65e252c282bf80f0a)
* Add support for WebAssembly threading (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/f0098baaaba9486ac790c8406ac9b46f31d615f4)
* Add the ability to override the runtime's assembly precedence (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/a11278711557ae4e97b88a4bedb192e658fba4cc)
* Disable gsharedvt by default, add EnableAotGSharedVT to restore it (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/d730c1899e364afac351d926eb7b62513f55bd2b)
* Enable WasmShellPThreadsPoolSize build property to control the pthread pool size (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/b3d4a2999e2bb932d2c738dc6128366bce2cf471)
* **powershell:** Validate poweshell execution policy on Windows (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/62736dc6d775b0023f0db1d0d205ed511b834151)
* Theme-aware splash screen (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/c2d3db3cd6454ed8bb3186f518db2fb974fab96a)
* Update devserver to support net7.0 (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/13ee17948f47af13d8973588561863ffe5d5d39f)


### BREAKING CHANGES

* `WasmShellIncludeWindowsCompatibility` is now automatically
set to false, and `<PackageReference Include="Microsoft.Windows.Compatibility" Version="7.0.0" />`
needs to be specified explicitly to get proper dependencies defined.
* The index.html file now requires the use of module initialization:

```html
<script type="module" src="./uno-bootstrap.js"></script>
```

+semver: major
